verses.verse: ה֤וֹי <WH1945> Ho כָּל־ <WH3605> Every צָמֵא֙ <WH6771> every one that thirsteth לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> come לַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> ye to the waters וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אֵֽין־ <WH369> have ל֖וֹ כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> and he that hath no money לְכ֤וּ <WH1980> come שִׁבְרוּ֙ <WH7666> ye buy וֶֽאֱכֹ֔לוּ <WH398> and eat וּלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> Come שִׁבְר֗וּ <WH7666> buy בְּלוֹא־ <WH3808> Without כֶ֛סֶף <WH3701> without money וּבְל֥וֹא <WH3808> and without מְחִ֖יר <WH4242> and without price יַ֥יִן <WH3196> wine וְחָלָֽב׃ <WH2461> and milk

לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תִשְׁקְלוּ־ <WH8254> Wherefore do ye spend כֶ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> money בְּֽלוֹא־ <WH3808> is not לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> bread וִיגִיעֲכֶ֖ם <WH3018> and your wages בְּל֣וֹא <WH3808> for לְשָׂבְעָ֑ה <WH7654> for [that which] satisfieth שִׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> diligently שָׁמ֤וֹעַ <WH8085> carefully אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to me וְאִכְלוּ־ <WH398> unto me and eat ט֔וֹב <WH2896> ye [that which is] good וְתִתְעַנַּ֥ג <WH6026> delight בַּדֶּ֖שֶׁן <WH1880> itself in fatness נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH5315> and let your soul

הַטּ֤וּ <WH5186> Incline אָזְנְכֶם֙ <WH241> your ear וּלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> and come אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> unto me hear וּתְחִ֣י <WH2421> shall live נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם <WH5315> and your soul וְאֶכְרְתָ֤ה <WH3772> and I will make לָכֶם֙ בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> covenant עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> an everlasting חַֽסְדֵ֥י <WH2617> mercies דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> of David הַנֶּאֱמָנִֽים׃ <WH539> with you [even] the sure

הֵ֛ן <WH2005> Behold עֵ֥ד <WH5707> him [for] a witness לְאוּמִּ֖ים <WH3816> to the people נְתַתִּ֑יו <WH5414> Behold I have given נָגִ֥יד <WH5057> a leader וּמְצַוֵּ֖ה <WH6680> and commander לְאֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> to the people

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold גּ֤וֹי <WH1471> a nation לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תֵדַע֙ <WH3045> [that] thou knowest תִּקְרָ֔א <WH7121> Behold thou shalt call וְג֥וֹי <WH1471> not and nations לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יְדָע֖וּךָ <WH3045> [that] knew אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> about יָר֑וּצוּ <WH7323> not thee shall run לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> Because יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto thee because of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God וְלִקְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> and for the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֥י <WH3588> for פֵאֲרָֽךְ׃ <WH6286> for he hath glorified ס

דִּרְשׁ֥וּ <WH1875> Seek יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> ye the LORD בְּהִמָּצְא֑וֹ <WH4672> while he may be found קְרָאֻ֖הוּ <WH7121> call בִּֽהְיוֹת֥וֹ <WH1961> become קָרֽוֹב׃ <WH7138> ye upon him while he is near

יַעֲזֹ֤ב <WH5800> forsake רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> Let the wicked דַּרְכּ֔וֹ <WH1870> his way וְאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אָ֖וֶן <WH205> and the unrighteous מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֑יו <WH4284> his thoughts וְיָשֹׁ֤ב <WH7725> and let him return אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God וִֽירַחֲמֵ֔הוּ <WH7355> and he will have mercy וְאֶל־ <WH413> on אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <WH430> upon him and to our God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for יַרְבֶּ֥ה <WH7235> for he will abundantly לִסְלֽוֹחַ׃ <WH5545> pardon

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor מַחְשְׁבוֹתַי֙ <WH4284> For my thoughts מַחְשְׁב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH4284> [are] not your thoughts וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor דַרְכֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1870> neither [are] your ways דְּרָכָ֑י <WH1870> my ways נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָבְה֥וּ <WH1361> are higher שָׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> For [as] the heavens מֵאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> than the earth כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So גָּבְה֤וּ <WH1361> higher דְרָכַי֙ <WH1870> so are my ways מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1870> than your ways וּמַחְשְׁבֹתַ֖י <WH4284> and my thoughts מִמַּחְשְׁבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4284> than your thoughts

כִּ֡י <WH3588> for כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יֵרֵד֩ <WH3381> cometh down הַגֶּ֨שֶׁם <WH1653> For as the rain וְהַשֶּׁ֜לֶג <WH7950> and the snow מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֗יִם <WH8064> from heaven וְשָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> there לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> and returneth כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo הִרְוָ֣ה <WH7301> not thither but watereth אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְהוֹלִידָ֖הּ <WH3205> and maketh it bring forth וְהִצְמִיחָ֑הּ <WH6779> and bud וְנָ֤תַן <WH5414> that it may give זֶ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> seed לַזֹּרֵ֔עַ <WH2232> to the sower וְלֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> and bread לָאֹכֵֽל׃ <WH398> to the eater

כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become דְבָרִי֙ <WH1697> So shall my word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> be which יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> be that goeth forth מִפִּ֔י <WH6310> out of my mouth לֹֽא־ <WH3808> It will not יָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> it shall not return אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me רֵיקָ֑ם <WH7387> unto me void כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo עָשָׂה֙ <WH6213> but it shall accomplish אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what חָפַ֔צְתִּי <WH2654> that which I please וְהִצְלִ֖יחַ <WH6743> and it shall prosper אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שְׁלַחְתִּֽיו׃ <WH7971> [in the thing] whereto I sent

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> with בְשִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> with joy תֵצֵ֔אוּ <WH3318> For ye shall go out וּבְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> with peace תּֽוּבָל֑וּן <WH2986> and be led forth הֶהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> the mountains וְהַגְּבָע֗וֹת <WH1389> and the hills יִפְצְח֤וּ <WH6476> shall break forth לִפְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH6440> before רִנָּ֔ה <WH7440> you into singing וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עֲצֵ֥י <WH6086> and all the trees הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field יִמְחֲאוּ־ <WH4222> shall clap כָֽף׃ <WH3709> [their] hands

תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> Instead הַֽנַּעֲצוּץ֙ <WH5285> Instead of the thorn יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> shall come up בְר֔וֹשׁ <WH1265> the fir tree [תַחַת כ] (וְתַ֥חַת <WH8478> Instead ק) הַסִּרְפַּ֖ד <WH5636> and instead of the brier יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> shall come up הֲדַ֑ס <WH1918> the myrtle tree וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> and it shall be to the LORD לְשֵׁ֔ם <WH8034> for a name לְא֥וֹת <WH226> sign עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for an everlasting לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִכָּרֵֽת׃ <WH3772> [that] shall not be cut off ס
